source.name: CA Pedestrian deaths
source.description: Pedestrian deaths in California, broken down by city.The Pedestrian Danger Index (PDI) measures of the relative risk of walking, adjusted for exposure.  Metropolitan areas are organized  from the safest to the least safe places according to their PDI for 2007-2008; the safest places for walking are those with lower PDI.
